title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a son according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to an unmarried boy. It is known that having children is every woman’s dream since childhood, and she treats her toys as if they were her mother. So we will understand its meaning with all the details it carries, whether from her lover or someone else. What is the interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy? Despite the fear of seeing him, we find that it brings her happiness and joy, completely contrary to her expectations, what awaits her in the future makes her one of the happiest people in her life. Her vision foretells a quick relationship, and the formation of a cohesive family, especially children, who enjoy indescribable beauty. Seeing a child in good condition in a dream is an expression of the good morals of her partner and his good treatment of her. Likewise, if the child is tired in a dream, this indicates the deficiency of her future husband and his distance from his Lord, religion and worship. The vision expresses good health and freedom from all fatigue at this time, as he emerges from all the negative circumstances that are placed on him and that cause him psychological and physical harm. The vision is a clear indication of a happy change and joy for him in all his daily details, as well as achieving all the goals he seeks. His birth in a dream without feeling tired and sick is a sign that she will emerge from all sorrows and fear for the future. The vision indicates the status of her partner in the future and what She will reach him in an important matter that she will be proud of in front of everyone and she will be happy to be associated with him. Giving birth to a boy is considered one of the happiest dreams that she sees, as it expresses a wonderful event and a radical change in her life for the better and more beautiful. The difficulty of childbirth and excessive sadness in the dream expresses her bad psychological state and the accumulation of worries and problems, and she must put aside this feeling and try to find practical solutions to these obstacles or seek help from those who are older than her. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to an unmarried boy by Ibn Sirin One of the most important things that the dream shows, according to the meanings provided by our respected scholar Ibn Sirin, is that her vision is happy and proves that she has achieved the goals that she has dreamed of throughout her life. It is a sign of her strength in life and her determination to achieve her desires and not give up and she is still thinking of the appropriate ways to achieve them. The difficulty of giving birth is one of the disturbing dreams that lead to problems and fears in her work or in her family, which makes her always sad and upset. Her vision expresses finding a partner who compensates for all the bad emotional stages that she has gone through before. The vision shows her life full of goodness, which makes her stand out from others. It is also an expression of the righteousness of her offspring in the future and their not heading towards bad ways The twisted one that brings her sadness and distress. It also shows the amount of help she receives in her life to achieve her many desires and wishes, so she will not feel disappointed or hopeless no matter what happens. What is the interpretation of a dream about the birth of a single boy for Imam al-Sadiq? If she sees him playing next to her, this is a depiction of the fulfillment of a long-awaited desire, and now it is time to catch up with it. His words to her are a confirmation of what will come to her of goodness and abundance at this time, and that she lives in an abundance that she has not seen before. If she has some ambitions and goals that she constantly thinks about, she should

title: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream and sleeping in a coffin in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the coffin for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and an unmarried married man, whether she is being carried to the grave, or sleeping inside the box instead of the body, and more. Ibn Shirin. Interpretation of a dream about a coffin in a dream. This is what dream interpretation scholars say. If the sleeper sees himself sleeping in a coffin And the fact that it is carried on necks indicates that this person will raise his status very high among the people. But if the person saw that he was making his own coffin or coffin, this indicates that this person is doing many praiseworthy things and that he will receive a reward for this act. But if Someone saw in a dream that he buys a coffin or that someone gave him a coffin, which indicates that this person will have a great status. But if the sleeping person can see what they carried in the coffin and people begin to pray for him for mercy and forgiveness, this indicates a lot of sustenance and satisfaction that will happen to this person. A person, but if people slander him, this indicates poverty, sadness, and illness. Dreaming of a funeral in a dream Ibn Shaheen says: If a person sees in a dream that there is a group walking in a funeral, this means that the owner of that funeral had the authority to rule over these people, but he was persecuting and torturing them. As he says: If a person sees that his funeral is walking on the ground, this indicates that that person’s journey is near, but if a woman sees that, this indicates that she will get married, and if she is married, this indicates that. Her husband spoils the religion. If he sees that he has fallen from his coffin, this indicates the fall of that person from a higher position in the world, and it is also said that this person is a hypocrite. Dream of seeing yourself sleeping in one coffin. Experts in dream interpretation say that if a girl sees in a dream, it indicates the reality of her death and pregnancy. In a coffin indicates that she will get married soon. Seeing him sleeping in the coffin of a married woman. A married woman who sees that she has died and was buried indicates that this girl is spreading corruption in the land. However, if the woman is married and pregnant, this indicates that she will give birth safely and that her child is safe and in good health. But if a pregnant woman sees that she died and was being carried to her funeral without anyone crying over her, this indicates that she will give birth, but it will be difficult for her to carry and her child will get sick.

title: The 50 most prominent interpretations of seeing snow in a dream by Ibn Sirin, seeing snow falling in a dream, seeing white snow in a dream, and seeing snowflakes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing snow in a dream People wait for the appearance of snow in winter from year to year, and some are optimistic about it and are just happy to see it. They believe that if snow appears in a dream, it is one of the happy things that brings goodness to a person and gives him happiness, but is the meaning of snow also present in the dream, or does its interpretation differ from dream to dream? In this topic, we will explain some evidence related to seeing snow in a dream. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing snow in a dream? Some interpreters believe that seeing snow in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions for a person because it is evidence of increasing goodness and blessing in one’s life and getting rid of it. From a difficult period he was going through. Snow in a dream is one of the things that promises the patient recovery and release from his pain. It is a sign of goodness, healing, and peace. If someone sees that he is walking in the snow easily and is happy to see it, this indicates that he will soon obtain a lot of money. But it requires some effort. This vision brings misery to a person. If he is in a lot of snow, that is, in a severe storm, this indicates that he will face some difficult things in his life’s journey. Throwing snow on others in a dream is considered an undesirable dream, which indicates However, the person faces some pressures that harm him. What is the interpretation of seeing snow in a dream? Wassim Yousef? Wassim Youssef explains that snow in a single woman’s dream shows the great effort she makes to make herself happy and achieve her goals, and shows the diligence and intelligence of this girl. He believes that the divorced woman who sees snow in The vision confirms the conflict in which she lives because of her ex-husband and his many disagreements with her, and one of the most important reasons for it is children. Waseem Youssef claims that a single person who sees snow in a dream is a sign for him that there are those who seek to ruin his life by hating him, so he must stay away from the evil of some Individuals. Seeing a pregnant woman with beautiful white snow in a dream indicates to her that she will give birth to a girl, God willing. Seeing kindness may carry happy connotations for the dreamer because it indicates his repentance for some of the sins he committed in his life. What is the interpretation of seeing snow in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin sees You will see that an unmarried woman who sees snow in her dream is a sign of staying away from some people because they are corrupt and expose her to danger and abuse, so this vision comes as a warning to her. The student of knowledge who sees snow in his sleep must be careful, because it is a vision that does not reassure him, as it warns him of Failure in some academic subjects. Ibn Sirin says that snow can bring good or evil to a person depending on what we see in the dream, but in general, it is a sign that the person is falling into some financial problems that lead to his debts. This vision comes to warn the person who begins A new business activity or trade means that this deal will not be completed and he may fail to carry out the work. Seeing snow in a dream for a single woman. A single woman who sees snow falling from the sky as she stands under it confirms that she will achieve some important things in her life that will bring her stability.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about picking olives in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is picking olives and eating them, this is evidence that she will achieve many of her dreams. If an unmarried girl sees olives in a dream and they are in the hands of another person, this means that she will soon marry a good man. When An unmarried girl sees in a dream a large number of olives in her house, this is evidence of blessing, goodness, and livelihood that will come to the owners of this house. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is cutting olives, this means that happy things will happen in her life. If an unmarried girl sees a tree Olives in her dream, this indicates a close marriage with a good man. As for buying olives in a dream for an unmarried girl, this indicates that she will hear the happy news. But if an unmarried girl dreams that she is climbing an olive tree, this indicates anxiety and sadness. Interpretation of seeing olives in a dream For a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is cutting olives and distributing them to people, this means that she will become pregnant soon. If a married woman sees green olives in a dream, this is a sign that she will hear good news soon. If a married woman sees olives in a dream, and they are found in her home, this indicates On kindness, and abundance of sustenance. Black olive oil in a married woman’s dream is evidence that you will earn a lot of money. If a married woman sees olives in her dream but they are not ripe, this means that her husband will face problems. As for buying olives in a married woman’s dream, this indicates her recovery. If she is sick. Picking olives in a dream for a married woman indicates pregnancy. You may be interested: Interpretation of seeing olives in a dream and its meaning in detail. Interpretation of a dream of picking olives in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of picking olives and eating them with her husband, this is evidence of the great love that exists between her and her husband. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is washing olives, this is evidence that she will get rid of all the problems she has faced in her life. Picking olives in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that happy things will happen in her life. If a pregnant woman sees herself distributing olives to children, this indicates However, she will become pregnant soon. If a pregnant woman sees yellow olives in a dream, this means that her pregnancy will be difficult. Interpretation of the vision of picking olives in a dream for a man. Picking olives in a dream for a man is a praiseworthy and promising vision, but according to what the man sees in a dream and one of the most important interpretations of this dream. For men: Picking olives in a man’s dream means a lot of halal food. If one sees black olives in his dream, this indicates a lack of nutrition. As for green olives in a man’s dream, this indicates an abundance of nutrition. But yellow olives in a man’s dream indicate sadness. And anxiety. If a person sees in his dream that he opens olives and takes out the pulp, this indicates the emergence of problems in the dreamer’s life. If a man sees an olive tree in his dream but cuts it down, this means a financial loss. An olive tree in a man’s dream indicates that he will suffer

title: A detailed interpretation of armpit hair in a dream

preview.html: In the following article, we examine with you the interpretation of armpit hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin, despite some believing that dreams are nothing more than a series of unrealistic fantasies and situations that a person sees during his sleep and that may come. From his inner desire to achieve some things that he finds difficult to achieve realistically, or they may simply be things that have exhausted his mind from thinking about them all day and appear in his dreams at night, but they are real and confirmed from ancient times and most human cultures agree that dreams come to a person to offer him a group Of the signs and symbols that carry specific associations in his real life. Therefore, we find that people seek, as soon as they wake up from their sleep, to search for the interpretation of their dreams, to know what these dreams will bring them in their coming days. The armpit and its meaning in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of armpit hair in a dream. The symbol of the armpit in a dream. According to Ibn Sirin, seeing a person cleaning the armpit area or removing hair from it is a good thing to see in a dream in general, because it indicates getting rid of problems and worries, but the interpretation of seeing hair on The armpit differs from one person to another depending on the situation in which he sees himself, and whether his armpit hair is long or short. As Ibn Sirin explained in his book, seeing the armpit hair being removed by “plucking” is better than seeing it being shaved with a razor or a sharp instrument, as the former indicates the fulfillment of hopes and desires. Reaching human aspirations. Life, as it includes preserving the Sunnah of the Prophet, obeying God Almighty, and performing acts of worship with pure intention. Removing armpit hair in general means getting rid of worries and problems if the matter is done without pain or bloodshed, but if it is seen that removing armpit hair is accompanied by blood or severe pain, then this It indicates the presence of some difficulties, problems in life and judgments, as this will prevent him from achieving what he wants. Seeing armpits in a dream for a single woman. According to Ibn Sirin, seeing an unmarried girl in a dream with long, clear armpit hair is something worthy of praise because it indicates the coming of great goodness for her, or it may indicate... The date of her marriage to a good man who was with him in her heart is approaching. Happy and will live a happy life with him. As for the unmarried woman who sees herself removing her armpit hair with some pain, this indicates that she will face some problems and obstacles in her coming days. Interpretation of armpit hair in a dream for a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin explained that if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her armpit hair Longer than usual, this indicates abundant goodness for her, which is that her pregnancy will pass safely without health problems, and that her birth will be easy, God willing. And she will give birth to a healthy, healthy child. However, if a pregnant woman sees that she is removing hair from her armpit and feels pain and soreness during this, this means that she will be exposed to some health problems during pregnancy that may lead to miscarriage and loss of the fetus, and God is Most High and knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about long armpit hair for women when A person sees excessively long armpit hair in a dream, as if its appearance and seeing it clearly disgusts those around him and makes him feel uncomfortable about himself, so

title: Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the dreamer entering prison in a dream? Longevity of the dreamer’s life and his feeling of comfort and reassurance. Do you emerge from a narrow, large and spacious space? An indication of the imminence of comfort and the disappearance of worry and sadness. What is the interpretation of the vision of escaping from prison? An indication of the liberation of the soul from distress. What is the purpose of the vision? A man getting out of prison? A sign of freedom from restrictions and fears. Interpretation of seeing yourself being released from prison in a dream? Evidence of getting out of seizures, distress, and extreme distress. Do you see yourself getting out of prison with friends? A sign that he will soon return from traveling. What is the interpretation of the imprisonment of a divorced woman? Listen to a lot of good news in the next few days. Seeing a pregnant woman crying and being imprisoned in a dream? Evidence of a failed cesarean section. Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream. If the dreamer sees himself entering prison in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s long life and his sense of comfort and reassurance. As for the scenes entering prison Decorated with roses in a dream is a sign of the soonest date of his marriage. While seeing an exit from a large and spacious narrow prison space, it is a sign of the nearness of comfort and the disappearance of anxiety and sadness. Anyone who sees the prison door open in his dream is evidence of the hope and constant optimism that the dreamer has. When The dreamer sees in his dream wide holes in the prison, this indicates the end of the worries and problems that he is going through. Interpretation of escaping from prison in a dream: Ibn Sirin explained that seeing escaping from prison in general is a sign of liberating the soul from distress. If a single girl dreams that she is escaping from prison with... Someone she loves, this is a sign that this person will help her start a new, better life. But if a married woman sees that she has succeeded in escaping from prison, this is evidence of an improvement in her health. title: Interpretation of a dream about eating snow in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing snow and eating snow for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a man, whether he is walking in the snow and rain in summer or winter, according to Ibn Sirin and more. Jurists say that the interpretation of a dream about seeing snow in a dream is one of the unpleasant dreams that indicate misfortunes and accidents in the life of the person who He sees it most of the time, and seeing snow in a dream can indicate kindness and sustenance. And because the interpretation of the vision differs from one person to another and according to the place. The interpretation of eating snow in a dream. Whoever sees that he ate snow in a dream, and the snow was cold, is better. The dream of eating snow in the winter is good and in the summer it is a calamity, and God knows best. The interpretation of snow in a dream for a single woman if she sees an unmarried girl In a dream, she extinguishes a burning fire with snow, this is evidence that this girl will obtain the highest grades in her studies, God willing, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of snow in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that snow is filling the roof of the house, this is evidence of the difficulties and problems that are passing. With this lady. Interpretation of snow in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating snow, this is evidence of a troubled birth and that this woman will give birth to a male child and needs care and attention during pregnancy and after the birth process. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of snow in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream someone eating snow, this is evidence of the presence of a deceitful person in this woman’s life and soon she will reveal the deception. Interpretation of snow in a dream for a man. If a man dreams that snow is filling the streets, this is evidence of illness. If a man dreams that snow is falling on his head, this is evidence of the debts that the dreamer is suffering from, and if a man sees in a dream that snow is covering plants and trees, then this is evidence that this person is losing money. If a person sees in his dream a snowstorm extinguishing a fire, then this is a sign of goodness and livelihood for the one who sees it, and God is the Most High, the All-Knowing. Interpretation of snow in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing pasta in a dream from Ibn Sirin’s point of view?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pasta in a dream: Pasta is considered one of the most famous and easiest dishes and is featured in many restaurants around the world, as its recipes and types are many and the few additions to it make it the most delicious dish.Interpretation of a dream about seeing pasta in a dream. Many interpreters agree that the interpretation of pasta in a dream is one of the visions. Good news that brings good news and good news in the near future. If one sees that he has invited many people to him and served them dishes himself, this indicates that the dreamer will make a big change in his life. Some interpreters say that the dream means the fulfillment of a dream that is unattainable or difficult to achieve Seeing colored pasta is evidence of the existence of multiple sources of livelihood and many opportunities for visions, which will provide him with a more comfortable and luxurious life in the coming period. If one sees that he is preparing large quantities of it, this indicates great happiness on the way to him and his family members will receive a large share. Of that happiness.Interpretation of a dream about pasta by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets pasta as a sign of goodness, blessing, plenty of sustenance, and good news in the coming season (God willing). If a married woman introduces her to members of her family, this indicates that one of the members of that family will be a source of happiness. For everyone. Our respected scholar says that a man who sees her in his dream and has a delicious appearance means that there is an important or famous person who will enter his life in the coming period and will be the source of a significant change in the course of his life. It also indicates attachment to people, or the presence of an important person in the life of the dreamer who He wants to get close to him and keep him in his life. The vision also expresses an upcoming trip, either for the owner of the vision or for someone he loves. Interpretation of a dream about pasta in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that if a man sees that there is a girl who brings him pasta and she is fine, this means that he will soon marry a beautiful girl and be happy. It is said that pasta can be interpreted as overcoming some obstacles and problems that the dreamer may face in the near future, so do not worry if he is exposed to it, it will end peacefully soon. It also indicates that there is good and happy news coming into the dreamer’s life, perhaps awaiting the arrival of a loved one Or the desire to end a quarrel with a loved one. Al-Nabulsi also interpreted seeing pasta in general as facilitating financial conditions, paying off debts, or completing future installments. Interpretation of a dream of pastaInterpretation of pasta in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried woman sees in her dream a plate full of pasta, This means that she has good health and a sound body and does not suffer from diseases at the present time, but she needs to maintain her health. Also, if the girl is suffering from a serious illness, or there is a loved one who is sick, seeing pasta indicates a complete recovery in the coming period ( God willing). The vision also indicates achieving a goal after hard effort and a long time. A girl who sees that she is cooking a large amount, this means that she is one of the owners of...

title: Interpretation of a mouse in a dream in different situations

preview.html: Many would like to know the interpretation of a mouse in a dream. Dreaming about a mouse is one of the most disgusting and disturbing dreams. It is a rodent that resembles a mouse in appearance. It is an animal that harms the mouse. The place where it is found, it is a means of transmitting diseases to people, and when a person sees it in his dream, he wakes up amazed because he does not know the meaning of this dream, and whether it is so. An auspicious or warning vision, so we will highlight through the following lines in the Encyclopedia of Interpretation of seeing a rat in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a mouse in a dreamInterpretation of a rat in a dream by Ibn Sirin The dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin says that dreaming of a rat indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to fraud. Among the strange visions For a mouse to die in a dream, it is an indication that the dreamer will get into a big problem that he will not be able to solve. Whoever sees in his dream that he is chasing a mouse, this means that he is a diligent and persistent person and is trying to achieve the goals he desires. If one sees in a dream that he was able to kill A mouse, this is good news for him that God Almighty will relieve him of his worries and relieve him of his sorrows, and that he will be able to pay off all his debts. A mouse that escapes from the house in a dream indicates that the dreamer suffers from worries and poverty. A mouse in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees a mouse In her dream, her dream indicates feelings of sadness, anxiety, and a bad psychological state. Whoever sees in his dream that she collided with a mouse, this indicates that the problems she faces will soon end. One of the ominous dreams for an unmarried girl is her dream of being attacked by a mouse, because it is a sign that someone is planning To harm her and create problems for her. A rat bite in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that there is a big problem on the way to her. If an unmarried woman dreams of a black rat, then this vision indicates that she will do a lot of bad deeds, and the vision here is a message for her to reconsider her thinking and behavior. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman having a rat: Seeing a married woman killing a rat in a dream is good news for her that her sorrows and fears will go away and all her problems will be solved. If a married woman sees in her dream that a rat is coming out of her mouth, this means that there are many problems between her and her husband and they may lead to Separation. One of the warning visions for a married woman is her dream of a white rat in her house, because it indicates the presence of a woman who has a grudge against her and does not wish her or her family well. Whoever sees in her dream that a rat has succeeded in biting her, then her vision indicates that she is suffering from the accumulation of debts as a result of her presence. A financial crisis in her family area. If a married woman dreams of a large rat, this is a vision that is not interpreted well, because it symbolizes the occurrence of sad events for her and her family. Interpretation of a rat in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream that a rat is chasing her, the dream indicates She will face some problems during her pregnancy. A mouse eating clothes in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the woman feels fear and anxiety about childbirth, which is reflected in her psychological state. A mouse in a man’s dream. A mouse in a man’s dream indicates

title: Eating wolf meat in a dream

preview.html: It should be noted that in the following lines we will learn about all the interpretations of a dream about eating wolf meat in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a wolf eating meat in a dream for a single woman. There are many interpretations of eating wolf meat in a dream for an unmarried girl, including: Some interpreters believe that seeing an unmarried woman eating Wolf meat. This shows her deception. When she sees a wolf appear, this indicates the presence of a cheater in the life of a lonely girl. If the wolf is white, this indicates her love for the cheater and his love. If the wolf is black, this indicates the presence of someone who hates her and wants to harm her. He also says Ibn Sirin said that the dream of eating wolf meat in the dream of an unmarried woman. It indicates the arrival of a religiously righteous man to marry her, and he has many tricks to facilitate her marriage. On the other hand, the appearance of the gray wolf symbolizes hypocrisy. This indicates that the woman appears alone, in addition To the girl’s lack of morals and her bad behavior with others. This dream may be a sign that the unmarried girl is eating forbidden money. On the other hand, if a wolf cry is heard, it appears in the dream. This indicates that the girl is isolated. Interpretation of seeing a woman eating Wolf meat in a dream The consequences of eating wolf meat in a dream are endless, but some of them can be deduced through the following points: A married woman has a vision that she is eating wolf meat. The deception and signs of deception that the woman is exposed to. It could also be the betrayal of her husband or her relatives. As for when You see a wolf growing up in a dream and then eating. This may indicate that the dreamer is raising an unhappy child. It is also said that he is eating the meat of a wolf that hunts a married woman. It shows that he is afraid of people who talk about bad things. But when he kills a wolf in a dream then Being eaten. This indicates intercourse with a malicious person who is hurt by words. Also, seeing a wolf eating wolf meat entering a woman’s home is evidence that there is someone nearby who is trying to harm her or is the cause of her later misery. This dream may indicate that the woman is losing her life because of an imposter. You may also be interested in: Wolves in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a wolf eating meat in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman dreams that she is eating wolf meat, this indicates many indicators, including each of the following interpretations: Seeing eating wolf meat in a pregnant woman’s dream. This means that her newborn boy will be distinguished by a strong heart and great wisdom. On the other hand, when she sees a wolf entering a pregnant woman’s house and then killing her and eating her. The dream is a sign that a thief has entered her house and stolen from her. Eating wolf meat in a dream also portends a pregnant woman. It indicates the presence Someone hates her and feels hostility and hatred on her part. But he shows her the opposite and represents his love for her, so she must get rid of her feelings towards him and her relationship with him. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of seeing a wolf in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of a dream about eating wolf meat by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin interprets seeing wolf meat in a dream Through a number of different signs and symptoms, among them: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a human being in manna
